introduction.title: A luxury shopping experience
introduction.description: Mytheresa is the most-trusted source for finding the finest selection of luxurious womenswear. Our expert buying team travels the globe with a simple mission: to bring international fashion's finest directly to your doorstep. With our runway-fresh new arrivals every week, an easy-to-navigate platform and a mobile app to shop on-the-go, we ensure a boutique-like feeling for a unique shopping experience.

features.left: The finest edit of more than 200 international luxury brands\n900 new arrivals each week directly from the runway\nWell-curated selection of items for a boutique-like shopping experience
features.right: Exclusive designer collaborations and capsule collections that you won't find anywhere else\nExceptional customer service available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week in 13 different languages\nFast, worldwide shipping to more than 130 countries

introduction.bottom_text: Shop with us and discover why Mytheresa is your final destination for online shopping for women.

authentic.title: 100% Authentic
authentic.description: Every item is guaranteed authentic, sourced directly from designers and authorized retailers.

shipping.description: Fast and secure worldwide shipping with full tracking and customs clearance service.

payment.description: Multiple secure payment options and buyer protection on all purchases.

hero.title: About TrendHub
hero.description: TrendHub is your most trusted source for discovering exquisite luxury fashion. Our expert buying team travels the globe to curate a selection of over 200 international luxury brands.

sustainability.title: TrendHub Sustainability Commitment
sustainability.description: Our sustainability framework is built on four pillars that shape our approach to environmental, social, and governance (ESG) issues.

planet.title: Planet
planet.description: Committed to improving our global operations' impact on greenhouse gas emissions and waste management, while providing sustainable choices for our customers.

talent.title: Talent
talent.description: Creating a diverse, equitable, inclusive, and positive culture for our employees, partners, customers, and the luxury industry as a whole.

product.title: Product
product.description: Committed to full transparency in brand and product ESG impact, supporting animal welfare, responsible sourcing, and circular economy.

policy.title: Policy
policy.description: Maintaining the highest standards in corporate culture, governance, and digital operations, including data management and corporate conduct.

vision.quote: Sustainability is a journey, not a destination; it's about practice, not just goals. In a world where environmental, social, and governance issues are increasingly urgent, we aim to grow our business in the most sustainable way possible.

reports.title: Sustainability Reports
reports.description: Learn about our latest progress and future plans in sustainability.

guarantee.title: Authenticity Guaranteed
guarantee.description: All items sourced directly from brands

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: TrendHub is dedicated to creating a platform that connects global fashion brands with consumers, making quality fashion accessible to everyone.

values.value1: Provide the best shopping experience for customers
values.value3: Continuous innovation and leading fashion trends

member1.name: Ming Zhang
member1.description: Over 15 years of experience in e-commerce and fashion industry

member2.name: Howard Li
member2.description: Focused on creating ultimate user experience and technical innovation

member3.name: Jane Wang
member3.description: Dedicated to creating unique visual experiences and brand identity

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact us

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to TrendHub's Privacy Policy page. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.

items.0: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information
items.1: By using our services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy
items.2: We regularly update this policy to ensure compliance with the latest privacy protection standards

information_collection.title: Information Collection
information_collection.content: Types of information we collect include:

items.0: Personal information you actively provide (such as name, email address)

information_use.title: Information Use
information_use.content: We use the collected information to:

items.0: Process your orders and provide customer service
We do not sell your personal information
items.1: Information is only shared with necessary service providers
items.2: Information may be disclosed when required by law
items.3: Third-party sharing only occurs with your explicit consent

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.content: We use cookies to enhance your shopping experience:

items.0: Essential cookies for basic website functionality
items.1: Analytics cookies to help improve our services
items.3: You can manage cookies in your browser settings at any time

security.title: Security Measures
security.content: We implement multiple measures to protect your information:

items.2: Limited employee access to personal information

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Regarding your personal information, you have the right to:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please don't hesitate to contact us:

general.title: General Information
general.content: The information provided on TrendHub is for general informational purposes only. All product information is subject to change without notice.

items.0: Product images may vary from actual items due to photography lighting, display settings, or design updates
items.1: Colors shown may not be exact representations of actual products
items.2: Information from third-party sources is presented as received and we cannot guarantee its accuracy

pricing.title: Pricing and Availability
pricing.content: While we strive to provide accurate product and pricing information, errors may occur:

items.0: Prices are subject to change without notice
items.1: Product availability cannot be guaranteed until order confirmation
items.2: We reserve the right to refuse or cancel orders with incorrect pricing information
items.3: Special offers may have time limitations and conditions that apply

thirdparty.title: Third-Party Content
thirdparty.content: Our platform features products from various retailers and brands:

items.0: We are not responsible for the content, policies, or practices of third-party retailers
items.1: Links to external websites are provided for convenience only
items.2: TrendHub does not endorse any specific brand, retailer, or product featured on our platform
items.3: Users should review the terms and policies of third-party retailers before making purchases

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: TrendHub and its affiliates shall not be liable for:

items.0: Any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from using our platform
items.1: Issues related to product quality, safety, or performance of items purchased through linked retailers
items.2: Delays or failures in performance resulting from causes beyond our control

items.0: The TrendHub name, logo, and content are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws
items.1: Users may not reproduce, distribute, or use our content without explicit permission
items.2: Brand names, logos, and product images belong to their respective owners
items.3: We respect intellectual property rights and expect users to do the same

modifications.title: Policy Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify this disclaimer at any time:

items.0: Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to our website
items.1: Your continued use of TrendHub after modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated disclaimer
items.2: We encourage users to review this disclaimer periodically for changes

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about this disclaimer, please contact us at:

shippingInfo.free: We offer free shipping on all orders.
shippingInfo.delivery: Estimated delivery within {days} business days after shipping.
shippingInfo.international: International orders may take longer to arrive.

returnsInfo.period: Unworn items can be returned within {days} days of receipt.
